head.title: DOM Selection
head.intro: Quick introduction to the HTML [DOM selection API](https://devdocs.io/dom/selection).

body.title: Methods
body.elms:
```js
sel.removeAllRanges() //  deselects
sel.addRange(range) //    sets a selection
sel.removeRange(range) // remove a range
```

```js
sel.rangeCount
sel.getRangeAt(0) // get the 0th range
```

body.title: Collapsing
body.elms:
```js
sel.collapse(parent, offset)
sel.collapseToEnd()
sel.collapseToStart()
sel.isCollapsed
```

```js
sel.containsNode(node)
```
